Job Title: Graduate Valuer

Location: Gladstone, MO

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Sales

Description:
About Us

Opteon is an international provider of valuations, advisory and specialist property services in the Australian, New Zealand and US markets. Recognised as the largest valuation professional services firm in these regions, we deliver meaningful solutions for our clients across all property types and market sectors. We are experiencing an exciting period of growth and change, positioning the company as one of the most prominent property services providers. Our future growth strategy is for organic growth, diversification and international expansion.

About The Role

An exciting and rare opportunity has become available based in Cairns,QLD for motivated individuals who have either recently completed a Degree in Business (Property) or are near completion. If you’re looking to begin your career in the property valuation sector, this is the position for you!

This role will assist qualified Valuers with a variety of tasks including in the field experience, assistance with quality valuation reports, providing excellent back-end support, client services, and general office administration.

This role offers career development opportunities for candidates with the right attitude and skills and will prepare you to become a Registered and/or Certified Property Valuer.

About You

We are seeking bright, motivated and articulate candidates who are looking to establish a career with our business. The successful candidate will demonstrate:

Near completion or recently completed Bachelor of Business (Property) or equivalentGenuine interest in customer service and property valuationsConfident verbal and written communication and report writing skillsExperience in multitasking and prioritising workloads in high volume environmentsProficiency and comfort with using Microsoft Office, web-based systems and learning new technologyA positive and professional mannerCurrent Driver’s license

Candidates with prior experience as a Graduate Valuer or with extensive experience in a property industry related field are strongly encouraged to apply.

What We Offer

A rewarding career for highly motivated individualsSupports your progress through to Residential Property Valuer (RPV) and/or Certified Practising Valuer (CPV) statusA positive and inclusive culture Industry leading technologyLearn alongside some of the very best property professionals in the industryFlexible work arrangementsIncentives available for interstate relocation

Join a high performing and supportive team who love to collaborate and work together to deliver the best outcomes to the business.

Candidates with all, or some of the skills plus a willingness for further professional development, will be considered for the position. We are open to full-time and part-time opportunities. Please tell us your preference on your application.

At Opteon we aim to build a positive and inclusive working environment and encourage First Nations people, those identifying as LGBTIQ+, people of all ages, gender and those with culturally diverse backgrounds to apply for this role.

How To Apply

If you are interested, please click the apply button and ensure you submit your resume and cover letter.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
